name: Atomic Heart: Trapped in Limbo
description:
Atomic Heart: Trapped in Limbo is a shooter-platformer game developed by Mundfish. It was originally released in 2024. Focus Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Atomic Heart: Trapped in Limbo on Xbox Series S/X, Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5. You can purchase the game on Xbox Store, PlayStation Store and Steam.
